import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { request } from "../../api/api"; export default function Index() { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); let [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ "Studentno": "", "Firstname": "", "Middlename": "", "Lastname": "", "Emailaddress": "", "Age": 0, "Address": "", "Gender": "", "Country": "", "Contactno": "", "Civilstatus": "", "Schoolcampus": "", "Degree": "", "Course": "", "Pictureblob": "", "ApprovedBy": "", "Servicecategorypriority": "", "RoleId": "", "Username": "", "Password": "", "Accountno": "", "Accountname": "", "Bankname": "", "Location": "" }); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; const handleChange = useCallback((e, key, form) => { let userDetails = userDetails; console.log(key); form[key] = e.target.value; console.log(JSON.stringify(form)); setUserDetails(form) }, []); async function doLogin() { const payload = { "Studentno": "SS2918", "Firstname": "Laraine+1", "Middlename": "Ferrr", "Lastname": "Fajardo", "Emailaddress": "laraine_fajardo+1@dlsu.edu.ph", "Age": 30, "Address": "Cabanatuan City, Nueva Ecija", "Gender": "Male", "Country": "Philippines", "Contactno": "097731733333", "Civilstatus": "Single", "Schoolcampus": "DLSU-Manila", "Degree": "Masters", "Course": "MIT", "Pictureblob": "", "ApprovedBy": "", "Servicecategorypriority": "", "RoleId": "Student", "Username": "lar+1", "Password": "password123", "Accountno": "9903820983298329832", "Accountname": "lar+1 fajardo", "Bankname": "Eastwest Bank", "Location": "Connecticuts" } const result = await request('register', payload); alert(JSON.stringify(result)); } return (

handleChange(e, "Studentno", userDetails)} value={userDetails.Studentno} className="col-12" placeholder="121000000" required />

); }
